website_summaries.verdict: Beige and black canvas material is both durable and stylish.
pros: Large cover fits over patio table with chairs tucked in
Available for square or rectangular shaped tables, in a range of sizes
Durable clips and elastic band allows cover to fit snugly on round tables as well
Air vents keep cover from catching in the wind
cons: Cover sits at a slightly higher price point than it's competitors

customer_reviews.title: Works great for us!
customer_reviews.text: My main goal for this product is to shade our furniture from the sun. This product worked out very well for us. We are located in Southern California, South Bay Area where the summers are in the high 80s and the winters high 30s. Not a lot of rain. The material seems durable, the length and width are just perfect for our outdoor table set.
customer_reviews.author: Kendra Hubick

customer_reviews.title: This photo is our cover during 50 mph winds and rain!!!
customer_reviews.text: This cover is fantastic!! Look at how it stays around our furniture even during such an awful wind & rain storm!!
customer_reviews.author: chyleen johnson

customer_reviews.title: Covered everything perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This is awesome. Thought maybe it exaggerated fitting over 4 chairs and a table - nope. Perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: rachel gresham

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for a wicker patio set. Couch, 2 chairs and a table. It was a little big for my set but I added a few side tables and heavy pots and it works fine. The leg attachments did not work for my set as the wicker legs are very thick, however, we pulled the cover right and placed the legs on top of the cover to hold it down. We’ve had a few nasty storms and the cover has worked very well. It does pool in the lower spots and we have to go dump the water and leaves off.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does not protect patio table from water
customer_reviews.text: Just took off cover after several days of rain and there is water on the inside of cover, in the table, and soaked into table. I had just wiped puddles away so you can see what table looks like after I did that... Cannot find a place anywhere that rain is getting in. Very disappointed. This was not a cheap cover and my table is an expensive one that I had hoped this cover would be quality enough to protect. Definitely deserve a refund on this. This had happened before but I kept using thinking it was a fluke. Apparently not.
customer_reviews.author: hayhauler

customer_reviews.title: 1 month in...So far so good!
customer_reviews.text: We've only had this cover for about a month but it's been a record rainfall month, with wind etc to go with it. I like that this cover has the straps that go around the chair legs. They add that extra protection in windy conditions. This cover hasn't blown off like its predecessor from another manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cover. Holding up nicely in the Arizona heat ...
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cover. Holding up nicely in the Arizona heat and has stayed in place during the worst wind storms. Excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gabby🥰

customer_reviews.title: Does not seem to be very durable
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two of these for our new patio sets. At first, they seemed to be great but after 5 months of use both of them have rips in them. They are under warranty and we will attempt to go that route. I'll update the review based on the companies response.
customer_reviews.author: AGJ

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size
customer_reviews.text: Size is great! Covers the table and chair. So far its good 😉
customer_reviews.author: ISH R.

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome cover for the table. It has great pulls for making sure it stays secure and most importantly dry.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle C

customer_reviews.title: Really Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: I had this on my patio table for six weeks. One area at the bottom tore through in 3 spots or so. No stress on it so don’t know why. I give up. Hoping the company contacts me about the bad review. Amazon is easy to order, but not at all easy to follow up on an item that should last longer than six weeks. My old patio covers for other furniture are still solid after SIX YEARS.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa C.

customer_reviews.title: Fits great, durability not so much
customer_reviews.text: 2 stars for the fit. It covered my L shaped outdoor couch and coffee table perfectly. The problem is that it only lasted about 6 months from April to October in Pennsylvania climate. It basically lasted through summer then split at the first signs of cold.
customer_reviews.author: Gene T.

customer_reviews.title: Survived 6 months
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this would last longer than some of the others tried but unfortunately it didn't make it past 6 months before the weather claimed the match. I live in NC and the sun can be brutal in the summer but winters are very mild, but it still ended up becoming discolored after a couple months and then the center rotted and fell apart leaving furniture exposed.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tilton

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty
customer_reviews.text: This is really big and sturdy. Pretty heavy and bulky to move around. Serves its purpose well. Water sucks right off.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa O

customer_reviews.title: Faded and ripped in months
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at the end of April and didn't even put it on my table until a month later. I do live in the southwest and it's been a hot summer, BUT, that is precisely why I bought this table cover. Unfortunately it immediately faded to a whitish-grey color (that would have been OK had the material remained durable) but then it immediately tore, probably where the end of the table was rubbing on it when the wind blew. I have BBQ grill covers, umbrella covers, and chair covers that have ALL lasted longer than this one, and didn't fade, either.
customer_reviews.author: akkeber

customer_reviews.title: No
customer_reviews.text: I need to get my cover replaced after 1 winter I uncovered and it tore to pieces says 3 year warranty not sure how to return, at this point I would say stay away from this product. I take care of my things and cant figure out how in 1 year I now need to replace thos cover.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Karalovich

customer_reviews.title: Just one fault:
customer_reviews.text: This ius the perfect dimension for a 8 top, 3x3x2x2 seatung table. The only problem is that chair backs are higher than the table, creating a well in the center. I raised the center by placing a few milk crates on the table top, but that still makes some peaks and valleys in the surface area that needs to be emptied fter a rain storm. Still it is 100% waterproof and good value. Notes that chair legs are exposed when the center is raised.
customer_reviews.author: Chris N

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable dense material
customer_reviews.text: Purchased square to cover chairs and table for mountain home windy outside deck. Has been on for a month with heavy rain and snow. So far it’s doing the job UPDATE 1/7/2020 still doing the job and held up beautifully over heavy winter snow and spring rains. Was not in direct sunlight. Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.author: Rocco Correale

customer_reviews.title: Expect one season of use
customer_reviews.text: I used this cover to protect a large outdoor patio set. I put them away for the winter in September and securely strapped the cover to the set. I even added some extra ties to take all the slack out of the cover and put moving blankets between the furniture and the cover to eliminate wear between the two hoping to preserve both the furniture and the cover. By February there were already several holes in the covert. Like many have already said this cover is made of low end material. Don't expect a year out of it.
customer_reviews.author: Bill T

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Clearly not waterproof, very disappointed in this product and now my cushion is ruined
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty outdoor furniture cover
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the 94" square table cover to cover our outdoor sectional couch and ottoman. We also put some large candleholders under the cover as well. Everything fit well and we were able to secure the cover to the couch using the attached straps. We then tightened everything up with the cinch clips. Our couch is on our covered deck so we purchased this more to keep dust off then water or snow so for us it should last much longer. The material was nice and thick so I imagine this would work well out in the elements.
customer_reviews.author: Prime Time

customer_reviews.title: Love the huge size!
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good! Love this HUGE cover that fits ALL our patio furniture! (Less the cushions, which are in the shed.) I’ve got one 6 foot table, one couch frame, one coffee table, six patio chair frames, and four patio chairs under here! Of course, things are stacked as they can be, but I was thrilled to get everything under here. We have not tied it down yet. We haven’t had any snow yet, nor lots of rain, so time will tell how this will hold up. But for now I LOVE it, and it’s easy to pull out a chair if I want one.
customer_reviews.author: Renee

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last a month
customer_reviews.text: This cover didn’t even make it thru the month. When I first put it on our outside patio set it looked perfect and seemed secure. First storm that hit us with 35 mph winds the straps that hold the cover down snapped off and the bungie cord broke. Seems durable, but is not. Wish I could contact them to see if maybe mine was just One of a bad batch. Spent a lot of money on this. Was hoping it would last us 2-3 years
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kept My Outdoor Dining Room Set High and Dry During Winter
customer_reviews.text: I bought this last November. I was impressed by the fit and finish. The tie-downs at each bottom corner allowed me to loop onto a table leg and prevent the cover from being buffeted by high winds. Nothing moved! When I removed it last weekend, it was still in great shape, and my dining room set was in great shape. Folded easily, and now it's awaiting another winter. I would definitely recommend this cover. Hoping the material holds up for at least 3-4 years. My last table cover (another manufacturer) only lasted 2 years before cracking.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny R

customer_reviews.title: Not waterproof
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cover primarily to keep my table clean and protect it from the hard water spray from the sprinklers, which it does. It does not melt or peel in the sun like some other covers' reviews said. However, it is NOT waterproof when it rains. The seam sealant seems to be peeling away, and the table is damp after rain. Disappointed about that for a relatively expensive cover.
customer_reviews.author: vcarlew

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems like it is made well. Being in California our winters don't start early. At least that's what we thought. This table cover remained in the bag through an early snow, and then a good rain storm. It's finally on the courtyard table now. We rushed out there and covered the table before the next storm and didn't have time to secure around the legs. High winds came with that storm and did blow one side of the cover over two chairs, but that's all. That wasn't the fault of the cover. I am happy with the cover and hope it holds up for a long time.
customer_reviews.author: Georgia

customer_reviews.title: 6 stars
customer_reviews.text: I have gone through 3 sets of outdoor covers in the past 2 Arizona summers. Brutal quality. Discouraged about covers until Ultcover -VERY waterproof. I have an outdoor pool table that I cover with this tarp. Was away for 2 weeks and rained. 1.5 inches of rain water sat on top for 2 weeks. Not a drop got through. Awesome! -Minimal fading in the sun -Durable; have caught the material on sharp corners with no tears -Various options for tightening/fit Finally found a high quality cover set. Love it
customer_reviews.author: Airlisle

customer_reviews.title: Fits an Ikea Table with 4 high back chairs VERY easily
customer_reviews.text: I have the 74"X74" size cover. I just bought the wooden Ikea table with 4 high back chairs and it fits with room.... but not so much room that it's dragging on the ground. The material seems to be super durable. There are straps on each corner and straps to wrap around chair legs to keep the cover on in high wind as well as a toggle on each side. I would purchase this brand again. I can't tell you how well it's going to hold up in the sun but I will update this review at the end of the summer.
customer_reviews.author: ✨ Marriana Maloney ✨

customer_reviews.title: Perfect cover
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for all of the patio stuff to be covered during a Michigan winter. I always dreaded having to cover everything with the blue tarps and then trying to find a way to get that blue tarp tied down well enough so that it didn't flop and flail all winter long. This covered solved the problem. Dropped it over the pile of stuff. Pulled the draw strings a little bit. Poof - done! I took this off the pile of stuff a week ago, washed it off, let it dried and refolded it for use next year. Honestly, I can't even tell it was outside for the winter. This cover was great and worked just as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great right now
customer_reviews.text: We've had this cover on our lakeside table and chairs for about two months now. So far, so good. We aren't there 100% of the time and needed something sturdy to cover our set, especially while we're gone. We'll see how it handles the weather in the Pacific Northwest (rain, drizzle, sun) except during the winter months. We plan on taking the whole set indoors for storage so it isn't out in the snow and frost.
customer_reviews.author: Annette P.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Using as a foosball table cover for the patio. Because of the handles sticking out, most covers we saw that were actually made for foosball tables either weren’t wide enough or didn’t cover the handles. We live in a part of California where there really are no clouds, just a very strong sun. So we wanted the handles protected as well as the rest of the table. This fits very well! Do not know if it’s truly waterproof, as we just do not get rain until October. We will then be moving our table back to the garage then.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth the price, works great
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for our blue patio furniture to prevent stains and bleaching from the sun since it gets no shade and the temps get to 100 degrees! For over 6 months it’s done it’s job well, it’s been raining non stop for a month and the furniture is still dry and in perfect condition! The cover itself is completely bleached where the sun hits it and I’m sure it will need replacing in the next year or 2 but worth the price to protect the more expensive furniture underneath!
customer_reviews.author: Spriggan Toadstool

customer_reviews.title: High quality cover
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased a wooden patio set (for 6 people) and needed a heavy-duty cover to protect them from months-long of Oregon rain. This cover is of superior quality. It is made of heavy water repellant material (much thicker than most covers I have seen before), it entirely and nicely covers the table and all 6 chairs and it is adjustable so that you can tighten the fit depending on your table's length. I will post an update once the rainy season starts and it has seen some weather. But for now, I am very satisfied and happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Snazzy

customer_reviews.title: NO.  :(
customer_reviews.text: This cover is good if you have mild rainfall. There is a plastic lining, however it does not protect in weather where there is a lot of rain. I covered my wood table and chairs and periodically checked. The more rain I had the more dampness, then wetness, was on my table under the "heavy duty" cover. I have now placed a tarp over my table and covered the tarp with the "heavy duty" cover. That is keeping the water off of my table and preventing damage and spoting.
customer_reviews.author: matilda2

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material
customer_reviews.text: Had this thing for less than 2 months, it is completely faded and ripped already. Thought for the $ I’d get something much better. On top of it, you only get 30 days to return it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Stop Trying To Save Money; Focus On Protecting Your Outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: If you are like me, you buy on Amazon to save money. But, sometimes we take it too far, trying to save money. Have purchased other furniture coverings that claim durability et al and, when it arrives, obviously won't make it through the winter months here in Chicagoland. Bottom line: The description of this item is waaaaayyyyyy understated. After my first purchase, I bought two more versions of this brand to replace the flimsy ones I purchased at Home Depot & Lowes If you need to protect outdoor furniture and appliances during the brutal winter months; buy this brand...you will definitely not regret!
customer_reviews.author: Megan Hennessy

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to cover our patio set for the winter. We have an oblong glass top table and 4 chairs, 2 of them rockers and 2 stack chairs. This easily covered the whole set. We even placed our bench glider and a few small stacked tables under there. I liked the elastic cords that we could snug up to secure the cover as well as the straps that helped secure this cover. It is very sturdy and survived our Wisconsin winter with snow and winds.
customer_reviews.author: jeatab

customer_reviews.title: One of the best!
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the best seasonal table covers we have bought! I'd highly recommend it. Our table had different legs than were shown in the manufactures pictures. Ours are straight legs on all four corners so didn't quite fit, plus our legs were 4X4 metal so the straps weren't big/long enough to go around them (this is a Sam Club outdoor table and set). What we ended up doing was putting the straps under the footpegs on the legs which held the sides down then just ran a few bungie cords from the middle of the sides under the table which pulled sides tight and under the table and held in it place real well.
customer_reviews.author: Jake

customer_reviews.title: Not a happy patio camper.
customer_reviews.text: Yeah I’m not really happy with this. It’s too big for the set it was sold as an accessory to so there’s a lot of overhang. We’ve had it for less than a month and it’s already sun bleached in spots. We ripped a hole in it on the first day tightening the straps to cover the patio set on one of the corners and it took on the color of some wood we put in top over night.i wouldn’t buy it again for half price.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymous

customer_reviews.title: I like if but its too big for my table with ...
customer_reviews.text: I like if but its too big for my table with 6 chairs I have to really roll the edge so it will look good and will not touch the concrete. But all in all I am satisfied bec of quality
customer_reviews.author: JENNIFER BALARES

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit and well made
customer_reviews.text: Shockingly I bought this for my outdoor dining set (sarcasm). The measurements were spot on. Can't say how well it will hold up to the typical NY weather, however it seems like it is very strong material. Vents are provided so air can escape on those windy days and not take your dining set with it. Tie down straps are provided and really work quite well. Lastly, the manufacturer included a patch should the cover tear at one point. Measure twice, purchase once, would have been a royal pain in the butt to get this folded back up and return.
customer_reviews.author: Hank

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy And Lots Of Ways to Secure
customer_reviews.text: This is a heavy cover, not commercial grade but good and it doesn't cost hundreds. Mine will be under shade, so I expect the coated canvas material to last much longer than the lightweight cover I bought at OSH a couple of years ago for about the same price. There are tie straps with buckles at all four corners but I just pulled the elastic draw cord tight at both ends to secure the cover to the table and chairs. The dimensions specified are accurate; it fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: DIYorDIE

customer_reviews.title: Ripped after a year. Beware.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this to cover my outdoor patio table exactly one year ago. Bought it to cover my outdoor patio table 1 year ago. It’s been pretty tough until this point where one of the sides ripped. I used some tape to hold the tear but with Miami humidity it won’t last too long and that tear will continue further until this thing has no use. I would’ve given this a 5 star if it would’ve lasted a while longer. I think a one year lifespan for an almost 60$ exterior table cover is pretty damn bad. Disappointed. Anybody know the warranty on this thing?
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Paba

customer_reviews.title: Update: (not so) great cover for groupings of outdoor furniture
customer_reviews.text: Update. I have to re-evaluate my review. In less than a year this product disintegrated. I personally think this is too expensive for such a short life. The plastic cover that came with the furniture set blew off/ripped up in a nanosecond, so I purchased this one. Heavy canvas and had stood up to big winds and snow. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good but not great.
customer_reviews.text: It serves it purpose well. It’s keeps the water and sun off of the things I’m covering with it. The only negative thing I can say is that the color fades extremely fast and extremely bad. After about 2 weeks the top portion that is horizontal is almost white and the vertical areas, or sides, are still the original color tan. It doesn’t look as nice as it did in day 1 but I’d rather the cover get faded and worn out then the items I’m covering.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Product is garbage, and don't believe the warranty claim
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 UltCover patio furniture covers. The product on Amazon states a 3-year warranty. It has been less than 2 years, and we don't use them year-round. As you can see from the pics, they are full of holes and splitting everywhere. It is impossible to contact the seller or the manufacturer - neither has a web presence, so no website, no phone number. When you try to contact them through Amazon, they bounce you back to Amazon, because Amazon was the shipper of the product. Amazon customer service has no contact information for the seller or the manufacturer and will only honor the Amazon return policy.
customer_reviews.author: Kara G.

customer_reviews.title: HEAVY DUTY COVER
customer_reviews.text: We are using this to cover 2 ATV's. This is perfect. It's a quality cover, extremely heavy duty. It offers multiple tie-downs and quick connects to ensure it stays put. I couldn't be happier. Don't waste you time with those thin tarp-like covers that you'll end up replacing in 2 months. Go straight for something like this. We also have a larger one covering out patio table and chairs. It works great. 100% waterproof, yet has venting. Well made.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Perfect product for extreme weather conditions!
customer_reviews.text: With living on the wet side of an island that gets roughly 120 inches of rain a year and many, many glorious days of sunshine.... we need a durable, well fitting cover for outdoor furniture. I was delighted at the quality. I was pleased and surprised that ordering a size larger (our chairs have high backs) worked out perfectly. The tie down strap set couldn’t be more perfect. Very, very happy with the product, the very fast shipping and the tremendously good pricing! Highly recommend this product..
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Buyer beware. Must replace every 18 months.
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware! We live next to the ocean, but in a temperate climate where there are not huge swings in temperature (San Diego). Unfortunately, while this cover worked for 18 months, the fabric has become extremely brittle, faded (to be expected), and the cover cannot be moved without holes appearing. We’ve tried to patch some, but it’s a losing battle. I can’t imagine how long this cover could even last in more extreme climates.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Sneed

customer_reviews.title: Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: It did not make it through the winter. The cover ripped after heavy snowfall. I contacted the seller to see if there was a warranty. They asked for photos, which I sent, but then never responded. Terrible customer service and the product should last longer than a couple of months.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly B.

customer_reviews.title: Protective but....
customer_reviews.text: Heavy duty material but I’m not sure how to stop the big puddle in the middle. I’m worried the sitting water is worse than the water exposure.
customer_reviews.author: R. Dabney

customer_reviews.title: High quality, great value
customer_reviews.text: This cover appears to be 100% waterproof, and it is large enough to accommodate a fairly decent sized patio set, even if you have to push the furniture together. It is very durable and it has tiedown straps which are crucial when you cover a large group of items so there are not valleys that fill with water and then collapse onto the furniture. Highly recommend, particularly for the reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: D.

customer_reviews.title: First year great but then dry rotted, faded, and Ripped!
customer_reviews.text: When the cover first arrived it was a great size, spacious enough to fit my large U shaped patio set and firepit, and did an excellent job keeping water off my furniture through all types of weather! Fast forward 16 months later and the cover is dry rotted and has ripped in several areas. I purchased this cover because it claimed to be of Sunbrella material, have a 3 year warranty, and fade resistant. I am very disappointed in the quality of the cover and the fact that I have to replace the cover just after 16 months! :(
customer_reviews.author: Pat B.

customer_reviews.title: Most durable cover I've purchased
customer_reviews.text: I've purchased other brands/covers in the past for my patio furniture and they only lasted one Midwest season - usually shredding from wind/rain/snow, also blowing off of the furniture. This cover has protected my furniture throughout the entire winter without a single issue. I do have taller-back chairs so the cover does not entire reach the bottom of the chairs but I am satisfied that it fits around the entire patio set (wish the company did make a size allowance for this). Be sure to measure your set accurately for the best size and fit.
customer_reviews.author: JK

customer_reviews.title: Best Product Out There
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely recommend this product!!! Excellent quality, very thick. Our new teakwood sofa set has stayed complete dry during strong storms. It has a ventilation slit and adjusting straps to keep it secure. Price was better than other places. No wait time to receive. Took a couple of days. Size is also great as sofa set (sofa, two oversized chairs, table and two foldable tables) fits perfectly and has room for something else.
customer_reviews.author: Aztec Princess

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: Does it protect from the elements yes, but notice how fast it fades, the smaller cover came in today from same company and the cover behind it was installed a week ago, I’m just waiting to see if it tears. Caution the timing from when you buy this item till the return date is short, angels and devil are always in the details. Product is ok but nothing special or durable like sunumbrella material.
customer_reviews.author: henry concepcion

customer_reviews.title: Great cover - way more I've expected....
customer_reviews.text: I am not so good Amazon customer. I purchase many things, but I leave just a few comments for products I really love or really hate. I purchased this cover to protect my corner sofa and table. I covered everything including cushions for two heavy-rain days.... When I removed cover everything was dry!!! Unbelievable :). Great product in even more great price :). Solid fabric, nicely done and finished - makes high quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Pawel

customer_reviews.title: Waste of $$$
customer_reviews.text: Used to protect my patio furniture and purchased about 13 most ago, used it alboy 50% of the time and somehow this 'durable cover' has two tears in it already from RAINWATER sitting on it and then next morning dumping water off. Don't waste your money, this ripped twice just while moving it. Works great for a few months but after that total CRAP.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Puchyr

customer_reviews.title: NOT Durable - Do NOT recommend
customer_reviews.text: Bought this cover to protect our patio sectional sofa and ottomans. Appeared durable when opened, however that wasn't the case: Color faded quickly over summer. Developed a rip in the middle of the cover. Came with a weird dark spot when purchased.
customer_reviews.author: James Nau

customer_reviews.title: ULTCOVER Patio Duty Table Cover
customer_reviews.text: The Patio cover seems to be of good quality however I did find it confusing because it didn't come with clear instructions on how to place it over the table and chair, also no video to show installing. Will have to see how it handles a Phoenix AZ summer. Also if chairs are not standard and have a HIGH BACK this cover doesn't fit well by drooping in the middle.
customer_reviews.author: Papa D

customer_reviews.title: Great quality for price
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Great quality. Seems like it is heavy duty and will last long. I use it to cover my outdoor patio 8 seat furniture set with two coffee tables and it has performed very well for this first week of use under heavy rain and moderate wind. I especially like the plastic clips that can secure to the bottom of the chair legs. I’ll update this after a few months of use during this summer.
customer_reviews.author: matthew

customer_reviews.title: Very well designed and made
customer_reviews.text: I have a backyard table with six matching chairs. There is no place to store it indoors, so It must remain in my backyard, exposed, all winter. I needed something that would protect it from rain and the staining of falling leaves. I had previously purchased covers from this company, so I knew their design and construction standards were high, so it made sense to buy their products again. Glad I did!
customer_reviews.author: Svalexplorer

customer_reviews.title: Tough and Rugged!
customer_reviews.text: fantastic table/chair quality! you will not find a better product for this high of quality at this price point! super tough and rugged canvas!
customer_reviews.author: bigbus41

customer_reviews.title: The cover stays put!
customer_reviews.text: I have had other covers for my table/chair set, but none of them have stayed on the table through a windy Midwestern storm. This one is different, because there are so many places where the cover attaches to the table. There are hooks to attach the cover to all 4 table legs, plus pull "tighteners" on all four sides to tighten the bottom of the cover for a snug fit. I feel ready to survive a Midwest Winter!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice size, needs more waterproofing
customer_reviews.text: Fits well over my wicker. The first rain I had damp cushions so not I have to “tent it” to make sure the rain does not pool. Overall it’s okay but don’t expect to keep your cushions dry.
customer_reviews.author: Inspectrex

customer_reviews.title: Didn't even last two years
customer_reviews.text: Ours already has a tear in it from less than hard use (deck is covered) and not even two years. Have not found out how to contact manufacturer. Disappointed overall - expected it to last longer.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Order a bit larger, don't forget the height of the chairs above table.
customer_reviews.text: Measured the table and chairs before ordering, but alas the cover runs a bit smaller than the the table and chairs; fits but since chairs are taller than table you will note a dip in middle. When ordering keep that in mind, so order noting additional 3 inches longer on width and length. Overall the cover is of good quality
customer_reviews.author: Roy A. Record

customer_reviews.title: high quality material
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this table cover for my backyard table. The size is a bit bigger than I expected but it covers the full table and 10 chairs. My table was beginning to get rusted with stains and I am very happy with my cover. The material is first quality and it is easy to put on and remove the cover . We have a beach condo and we only use it during weekends. The weather has been terrible and raining every day so I decided to cover my table and it has been a wise decision.
customer_reviews.author: Grissette Vasquez

customer_reviews.title: You have to try this one
customer_reviews.text: Amazing, well built cover. I purchased this to replace another thinner and poorly-manufactured cover that I had purchased at a big-box hardware store. The difference is night and day. The built-in straps and buckle ensure a tight fit that will hold even in the biggest of storms. I did test the water resistance by spraying with a hose for a few minutes and nothing got through. Very happy with this purxhase!
customer_reviews.author: Beach 4 Life

customer_reviews.title: Nice quality, easy setup
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a large rectangle to fit over my square table with the chairs pushed up to it. It works great! Keeps the cushions clean and dry and dust free. The construction of this cover is very well done, strong stitching and nice materials. A good value for the price.
customer_reviews.author: M Scottsdale

customer_reviews.title: You can order this product with confidence.
customer_reviews.text: I was at one of the big box stores a couple days ago looking for patio furniture covers. I found much less impressive items, at a much higher price. I was extremely impressed upon unpackaging this item, at the strength and quality of the fabric and It fits as described. Don’t hesitate. Order this product with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: KJM

customer_reviews.title: Great cover
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a new table and chairs for my patio and the Chairs are red and I didn’t want them to fade because the sun always fades the red out so I’m hoping the cover will keep my chairs from fading from the weather and I need it for a winter cover seems like it’s gonna be very good
customer_reviews.author: Rose M. Whittington

customer_reviews.title: would be awesome but MOLD!
customer_reviews.text: I think it does all the things I bought it for, protects my table and chairs, large enough, and water resistant. What this doesn't do is prevent mold from growing on it. See the pictures, those are not stains but mold growing. Surprised that no one has mentioned it yet.
customer_reviews.author: SMC

customer_reviews.title: Very tight! measure and leave space.
customer_reviews.text: This is a high quality cover, but give yourself room to pull it over. Have at least 2 inches to spare. With my pieces just pushed together, I couldn't get It over. I have to flip some over and puzzle them together. Still, I'm sure this will protect them and it looks okay.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Ego

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: I wasn’t expecting a great quality cover. Just because that’s not my luck. But what I got was that and more. It is high quality. I went with the bigger size just because I wasn’t sure and it covers a sofa, table chase and chair. It rained the first night we had it and not a drop went thru. Very happy. Very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works but fades.
customer_reviews.text: We used this to cover our outdoor seating. It was plenty big and keeps the furniture clean but it does fade fairly quickly. You can see the sun fading on the top so may be better suited for furniture that’s covered by an awning or something. That said, it does it’s job. To be fair, we live in southern ca where there is a lot of sun.
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: I was impressed -- was
customer_reviews.text: When I bought this a few short months ago I was impressed with the heft and apparent quality. It seemed like a great bond of canvas on the outside and vinyl on the inside. Very heavy and oozing "quality." But this week when I was putting the cover back on the firepit table and chairs I noticed this large rip. Crap. I've seen this before. One rip will lead to many. As you can see from the photo this cover is loose fitting -- I'm not pulling it tight over the corner of the chairs and table. Guess I need to check out the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: sard

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Very impressed with the quality of this cover! I just got it today and put it on my new outdoor set. It is very easy to use and very secure. I was worried it would blow off in our windy weather but it’s very secure and easy to take on and off! I can’t wait to see how it holds up in rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amy

customer_reviews.title: Not very tough.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased in April and by October it was discolored from the sun and tore. Called amazon for information on the three year warranty after a brief hold said that the company does not cover the warranty but as a courtesy would honor it with a refund. The fit was perfect for my 8 seater patio set and it was water resistant but it did not hold up long.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan R

customer_reviews.title: Survived the storms !!
customer_reviews.text: This is an amazing furniture cover it with held through the worst storms we had in the past year. I also stayed still with all the rain and heavy snow off more than 2 feet long. I am truly blessed with this purchase because it got my outdoor furniture very clean and safe.
customer_reviews.author: Sam Hamadi

customer_reviews.title: protects from weather, but rips easily.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this cover last May, with a warranty of 3-years. To protect from weather, I even bought an UV spray, and used it 2x during the year, to last a little longer. The cover ripped, and is already stained - if you are looking for a cover to last you at least 2-3 years, this is NOT the product you are looking for!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Weighed down
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working out great till it rained. The water resistance was great but the cover got weighed down and stuck to the table. It left an awful plastic stain that I can’t get out. So the sun didn’t ruin the table, the cover did!!!
customer_reviews.author: Book Addict

customer_reviews.title: Better Than Good
customer_reviews.text: This covered a 48x48 table and 4 high backed chairs nicely. It hasn't rained or snowed yet, but the material seems stronger than previous covers we've purchased. Good tie downs. I put padding between the chair backs and the cover to prevent friction from punching holes in the cover, but it may turn out to have been unnecessary. Attractive and durable.
customer_reviews.author: MtnGal

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Even though our outdoor patio table and chairs are under cover, the AZ sun is strong and takes a beating on protective covers over time. I just replaced ours with this one and it is heavy duty and great quality. We measured so we are happy with how this cover fits over the table as well as the chairs around it. Happy with this purchase! Hope to have it for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Debra Mann

customer_reviews.title: Great cover with EASY install!
customer_reviews.text: We put the cover on our large outdoor dining table and 6 chairs before the snow hit. Cover appears VERY well made and want on way easier than the ripped one it replaced. Quality appears excellent. It's under snow now, but will adjust this review if we see issues or if it doesn't last for years. So far, I have high hopes.
customer_reviews.author: MosquitoSue

customer_reviews.title: A furniture cover that really works
customer_reviews.text: This cover keeps my oval glass top table and 4 high back chairs clean and dry. Other covers allowed the rain to seep thru and dirt/dust al well. Do not even think of buying KoverRoos because the company does not work with you when an issue arises and the covers are porous. Allowing rain, dust and dirt to seep thru.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Boy

customer_reviews.title: Ok I think
customer_reviews.text: Good quality materials, sizing somewhat misleading. With chairs that are taller than the table (which is almost always true...) There becomes a large divet in the middle which fills with snow, ice and water. Thinking a better quality cover may pull tighter and reduce this puddle.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worth Every Penny!
customer_reviews.text: I am so pleased with this cover. It’s thick & sturdy & very durable. I love the 4 clips it has along the bottom to securely fasten it to the chairs so it won’t fly off in heavy wind. It’s saving my patio furniture-a table & 6 chairs & rug.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jorgensen

customer_reviews.title: Protect your patio investment with this cover!
customer_reviews.text: This cover delivers everything it promises and more, even including a large patch in case of a tear. It covered our long table, all the chairs with room to spare, so we added two more loose chairs! Wow! What a bargain! My brother-in-law was over yesterday and had me send him the link. He’s ordering one for his patio! Excellent buy. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Elle Oop

customer_reviews.title: Not durable, not outdoor rated.
customer_reviews.text: Didn't last a year! All colour vanished and withthe wind it ripped off badly! Now my furniture is damaged. Would not recommend this product at all.
customer_reviews.author: Gerardo C. Guzman Lozano

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Love it, keeps water off of my outdoor table and chairs set, prevents rust and wear! Easy to use, adjustable and straps down. Water does collect on the top after it rains so I suggest getting a blow up bag you can buy to put under it. I have to lift the cover to get the rain water off, so I will buy the inflatable bags soon.
customer_reviews.author: GF

customer_reviews.title: Nice weatherproof cover for patio furniture
customer_reviews.text: Built a custom 6’ x 6’ table for our patio. I needed a rain/weather cover for the table including 8 chairs. The cover arrived quickly and the material seems pretty thick and durable. It does repel water well. I will give it a 5 star rating for now and will see how well it holds up over the next 12 months.
customer_reviews.author: David W.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: OMG! This the best solution for storing the table AND the chairs on the deck rather than stuffing them into the shed for the winter. We'll see in the spring if the cover survives and can be used again. But for now, I'm loving it!
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: Great so far
customer_reviews.text: Its been only a week since I bought this; fits great on our square patio dining set. HAd a huge downpour one night and next day checked to see all furniture fully dry. So looks like it is as advertised, and will protect the furniture it covers..
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works well for a sofa set!
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a cover for an outdoor 5 piece sofa set (sofa, one chair and a small table). I noticed someone else bought it for this purposes as well and it works great! It does collect water that it wouldn't if it was on a table - easy to get the water off - and I put the excess fabric under the furniture to secure it (the tabs made for table legs are not big enough for the legs of the furniture). Neither of these things are a problem for me. Seems very durable - has been through rain and wind with no issues. Recommended!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this cover!
customer_reviews.text: Update 12/1/2019 I was putting this on for the 2nd year and it tore in one spot on one of my chairs. It seems to have become a bit fail from the first season in the elements. it still works but is a bit worn thin. I have a large 6 person table & chairs and this covered the entire thing. I can't wait for spring when I remove it to see that my furniture will be in excellent condition. This is an excellent investment!.
customer_reviews.author: Zlee63

customer_reviews.title: Picnic table cover
customer_reviews.text: The cover appeared to be heavy good quality, I did not unpack the whole thing for fear I wouldn’t be able to get it back into the box, I just did not like the color beige at all. There is no free return unless you bring it to kohl’s which I never go to. I really would have appreciate a UPS label or USPS label.
customer_reviews.author: Miss Charlotte

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This did not survive one season. It’s terrible quality. Very disappointed. Not worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Yela

customer_reviews.title: so far so good
customer_reviews.text: it does bleed a little on heavy rain days. the straps and ties downs work great tho - much better than the last cover. too soon to say how long it will last
customer_reviews.author: crazyalzado

customer_reviews.title: Will Buy this one again
customer_reviews.text: Great cover, especially for the price...so far lasted longer than the custom fit one I purchased from Pottery Barn. Will buy this one again if it wears out (it is outside 365 days/year, so yeah, it will wear out eventually)
customer_reviews.author: Purchaser

product_meta.title: ULTCOVER Rectangular Patio Heavy Duty Table Cover - 600D Tough Canvas Waterproof Outdoor Dining Table and Chairs General Purpose Furniture Cover Size 88L x 62W x 28H inch
feature_bullets: Guaranteed to fit rectangular/oval patio table and 4-6 standard chairs size up to 88"(L)x62"(W), include distance that chair backs jut out from the table while measuring. Actual cover size is 90"(L)x64"(W)x28"(H)
Made of top quality 600D polyester canvas complex with waterproof backing. Tough enough to keep rain, hail, snow, dust, leaves and bird droppings away.
ULTCOVER provides 3 years warranty and guarantees to be 100% waterproof with seams taped, it’s a “WATERPROOF & BREATHABLE” cover.
Well-made structured air vents at two sides stay open to prevent wind lofting. Plastic clips & heavy duty elastic draw cords secured to table leg, especially during high winds and severe weather.
100% coverage design avoids the exposure of furniture in the sun makes your furniture always look like new.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars2,501 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
